other_title: ビート・エックス ネオ (Japanese)
plot: B't X stopped with the fight between Teppei and Ron. B't X Neo continues the story from there. Teppei continues his fight to save his brother Kotaro Takamiya and the world from the Machine Empire and the B't Raphael.Continuation of Teppei's journey with B't X to rescue his brother Kotaro Takamiya from the Machine Empire. The OAV series picks off from the TV series from the point where Hokuto successfuly saves both Teppei and B't X and makes B't X far more powerful than before.
opening_theme: "A Piece of the Sun" by Masaaki Endou
ending_theme: "Eien no Sono Saki" by Masaaki Endou
"Towa no Sono Saki ～YOU ARE THE BEST BUDDIES～" by Masaaki Endou
insert_song: "Hitomi wa Ikusen Mado" by Aki Hata (ep 14)
